name: Miner Mines
description:
This is a short 25 level 2D platformer using lights as a mechanic

You are a Miner inside the mines searching for the blue ore whilst also closing in on the surface.

Although the story seems simple there is more to it than you just being a miner.

Also to quit the game press F4

I hope you enjoy this game even though it's short.

More updates will come such as:

 -Music

 -Story Update

 -More Levels

<-NoOne->
